name: CONSUMER TECHNOLOGY ASSOCIATION (PREVIOUSLY THE CONSUMER ELECTRONICS ASSOCIATION
description: Trade association for the consumer electronics industry
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to consumer privacy, data protection, cybersecurity, encryption, the Internet of Things, cloud computing, virtual reality and artificial intelligence
Issues related to the Internet of Things, Artificial Intelligence, Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality, Cloud Computing, data protection and security
Sec. 702 FISA reform, reform of the Electronic Privacy Communications Act, H.R. 4943 the CLOUD Act, issues related to encryption, cybersecurity and the Internet of Things.
Issues related to energy efficiency standards
General trade issues, digital trade issues, small business and ability to export, bilateral trade agreements, cross-border data flows, NAFTA, and tariffs on Chinese products
